title: Gearhead
description: The clayground design system — React Aria Components + Tailwind CSS. Interactive Storybook with all shared UI primitives.

title: Vite Template
description: A minimal Vite + React + TypeScript starter wired up for GitHub Pages static export. Copy this to begin a new project.

title: Something's Happening
description: A real-time event timeline experience. Relive the Super Bowl LX 2026 streaker incident through fan footage, tweets, and media moments — playable like a social Shorts feed.
